mapper.sql: track_id, base_id, base_name, dmp_base_name, prod_id, prod_name, dmp_prod_name, biz_no, biz_name, biz_type, biz_src, biz_sts, node_person, priority, urgent_level, submit_date, deal_days, ask_end_date, plan_release_date, plan_online_date, dmp_update_time, delete_flag, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into mnt_req_track ( base_id, base_name, dmp_base_name, prod_id, prod_name, dmp_prod_name, biz_no, biz_name, biz_type, biz_src, biz_sts, node_person, priority, urgent_level, submit_date, deal_days, ask_end_date, plan_release_date, plan_online_date, dmp_update_time, delete_flag, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date ) values ( #{baseId}, #{baseName}, #{dmpBaseName}, #{prodId}, #{prodName}, #{dmpProdName}, #{bizNo}, #{bizName}, #{bizType}, #{bizSrc}, #{bizSts}, #{nodePerson}, #{priority}, #{urgentLevel}, #{submitDate}, #{dealDays}, #{askEndDate}, #{planReleaseDate}, #{planOnlineDate}, #{dmpUpdateTime}, #{deleteFlag}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{modifier}, #{modifyDate} )

insert into mnt_req_track ( base_id, base_name, dmp_base_name, prod_id, prod_name, dmp_prod_name, biz_no, biz_name, biz_type, biz_src, biz_sts, node_person, priority, urgent_level, submit_date, deal_days, ask_end_date, plan_release_date, plan_online_date, dmp_update_time, delete_flag, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date ) values
( #{item.baseId}, #{item.baseName}, #{item.dmpBaseName}, #{item.prodId}, #{item.prodName}, #{item.dmpProdName}, #{item.bizNo}, #{item.bizName}, #{item.bizType}, #{item.bizSrc}, #{item.bizSts}, #{item.nodePerson}, #{item.priority}, #{item.urgentLevel}, #{item.submitDate}, #{item.dealDays}, #{item.askEndDate}, #{item.planReleaseDate}, #{item.planOnlineDate}, #{item.dmpUpdateTime}, #{item.deleteFlag}, #{item.creator}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifyDate} )
mapper.update:
update mnt_req_track
base_id = #{baseId},
base_name = #{baseName},
dmp_base_name = #{dmpBaseName},
prod_id = #{prodId},
prod_name = #{prodName},
dmp_prod_name = #{dmpProdName},
biz_no = #{bizNo},
biz_name = #{bizName},
biz_type = #{bizType},
biz_src = #{bizSrc},
biz_sts = #{bizSts},
node_person = #{nodePerson},
priority = #{priority},
urgent_level = #{urgentLevel},
submit_date = #{submitDate},
deal_days = #{dealDays},
ask_end_date = #{askEndDate},
plan_release_date = #{planReleaseDate},
plan_online_date = #{planOnlineDate},
dmp_update_time = #{dmpUpdateTime},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag},
creator = #{creator},
create_date = #{createDate},
modifier = #{modifier},
modify_date = #{modifyDate}
where track_id = #{trackId}

update mnt_req_track
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag},
modifier = #{modifier},
modify_date = #{modifyDate}
where delete_flag = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT base_name, prod_name, biz_sts, COUNT(1) as count from mnt_req_track where biz_type='客户需求' and delete_flag='0' GROUP BY base_name, prod_name, biz_sts
